products.name: Personalized Gift Hamper in blue theme
products.description:
Happy to collab with @the.beadery.co and sent out this pretty gift hamper!

The request was to curate everything in blue and this is what I and @the.beadery.co put together as a very budget friendly gift hamper!

DM for more enquiry on such orders and we will be happy to bring your idea into a beautiful reality!
